title: Surface Welltest Unit
description: Complete surface welltest units for well evaluation and production testing operations.
longDescription: We offer integrated well testing in the exploration, appraisal and development phases of oil and gas wells. With almost 1 decades of experience coupled with state of the art equipment and technical expertise, our aim is to provide precise testing results. Clients avail our services for extended well tests, leading to early production facilities that allow them a force multiplier, further monetising their exploration wells in the shortest of time.

features.title: Integrated Testing
features.description: Complete well testing solutions for exploration, appraisal and development phases

features.title: State-of-the-art Equipment
features.description: Advanced equipment compliant with global standards including CE/PED, ASME, API, GOST

features.title: Precise Results
features.description: Accurate testing results with almost 1 decade of experience and technical expertise

features.title: Early Production
features.description: Extended well tests leading to early production facilities for quick monetization

processes.title: Well Assessment
processes.description: Initial evaluation of well conditions and testing requirements

processes.title: Equipment Setup
processes.description: Installation and configuration of surface welltest equipment

processes.title: Testing Operations
processes.description: Execution of well testing procedures and data collection

processes.title: Data Analysis
processes.description: Comprehensive analysis of test results and reporting

equipment.name: SSV (Surface Safety Valve)
equipment.description: Hydraulically actuated Fail-Safe gate Valve for Testing oil and gas wells with high flow rates, high pressure, or the presence of H2S.

equipment.name: Three Phase Separator
equipment.description: Instrumented vessel that separates well effluent into three phases‚Äîoil, gas, and water‚Äîfor well testing.

equipment.name: Choke Manifold
equipment.description: Used to control fluid from the well by reducing flowing pressure and achieving constant flow rate.

title: Sand Management and Flowback Packages
description: Comprehensive sand management solutions for well completion and production operations.
longDescription: WHE provides Sand Management System with 10K & 5K rated equipment with multiple sand screen options including 100 Micron, 150 Micron, 200 Micron, and 400 Micron configurations. Our comprehensive range includes dual pot sand filters, sand catchers, separators, and sacrificial choke manifolds.

features.title: Multiple Screen Options
features.description: 100, 150, 200, and 400 Micron sand screen configurations available

features.title: Complete System
features.description: Comprehensive range from catchers to manifolds and piping

features.title: Proven Efficiency
features.description: 80-90% sand capture efficiency in initial separation stages

processes.title: System Design
processes.description: Custom sand management system design based on well conditions

processes.title: Equipment Manufacturing
processes.description: Fabrication of sand management equipment to specifications

processes.title: Operations Support
processes.description: Ongoing operational support and maintenance services

equipment.name: Sand Catcher
equipment.description: Required to capture large amounts of sand during well opening or sluggish flow. Captures 80-90% of sand particles in initial separation stages.

equipment.name: Dual Pot Sand Filter
equipment.description: Used to remove sand and solid particles from effluent to prevent erosion of downstream equipment.

title: Engineering and Fabrication Services
description: Complete engineering design and fabrication services for custom equipment.
longDescription: We provide comprehensive engineering solutions including static equipment design using advanced software, structural design and analysis, complete fabrication services, and turnkey project solutions. Our facilities include a 15,000 sq. ft. fabrication plant with 10 ton EOT crane and 50,000 sq. ft. open storage area.

features.title: Advanced Design Software
features.description: PV Elite, HTRI, COMPRESS, STAAD Pro, and ANSYS for comprehensive design

features.title: Complete Fabrication
features.description: 15,000 sq. ft. plant with 10 ton EOT crane and 64 skilled welders

features.title: Turnkey Solutions
features.description: Complete project solutions from design to commissioning

features.title: Quality Assurance
features.description: Hydro test facility up to 1500 kg/cm¬≤ and comprehensive QC systems

title: Flow Line Equipment

longDescription: We are dealing with product development, manufacturing, service, repair, reverse engineering and re-manufacturing. Our service division provides retrofit and refurbishing of all upstream, midstream and downstream products according to ASME and API guidelines.
